keats, byron, shelley, girodet - none of them could compare to...
body:
new romantics. | sansa x margaery | 3.2k | modern/artist au

keats, byron, shelley, girodet - none of them could compare to sansa stark and margaery tyrell when it came to the finest art of all; romance.

a trilogy of vignettes chronicling three moments in their blossoming relationship.

or;

where margaery is an artist, sansa is a model and there’s an indisputable frisson of attraction in the air.

summary: "Where did you get that stupid notion from?" his sister asked. She was furious, so was Sansa. "You shouldn't be the one who...
body:
West of Westeros

“Where did you get that stupid notion from?” his sister asked. She was furious, so was Sansa. “You shouldn’t be the one who asks, you’re a sailor, seeking adventure is what you do” he told her. “It’s too risky, we might never see you again” “Perhaps” “Please Theon, you almost died, I can’t lose you again” “I’m sorry. But it seems that I’m losing myself right now. I have to find my purpose, even it’s dangerous. I’ll miss you both more than anything”

…..

“So if you die or get lost it will be on my shoulders” Arya said with a smile. “It is my choice, but thank you for the suggestion” he said and turned her smile back. Then, something happened, a strange thing that never happened before Arya’s eyes was filled tears, the next moment she was hugging him, just as tight as Yara and Sansa hugged him and they stood like that for a while. Finally, Arya broke the hug and told him “Goodbye brother” and he had never been so proud.

title: NEW FIC BLURB
body:
title: nosediving into bandages
pairing: jon snow x sansa stark, game of thrones
au: 1950′s/ ww2 era
a/n: they aren’t related! i’ve taken a lot of creative liberties so as long as you’ve watched the first season there will be no spoilers

——-

Even through the pain and misery brought on by the war there was some light. During this time, pilots rose to fame thanks to all the fights being up in the sky. Idolized by everyone, there was Jon Snow. More commonly known as the “White Wolf of the North”, he had his signature white wolf with burning red eyes painted on the side of his plane next to his house sigil, a direwolf. There was nothing that could stop him from nose diving and shooting down the Lions.

blog.name: kateofthecanals
blog.title: "I'm honest. It's the world that's awful."
blog.description:
Musings from a writer/director that mostly have to do with ASOIAF/GoT. 
I am a proud (AND VOCAL) member of the SanSan Defense League. 
Kylo Ren is my precious trashbaby. 
My blog, my rules. 
Now let's play!

tags: i also reject this idea that show-sansa succeeded 'despite her abusers'
when SHE HERSELF SAID it was BECAUSE of her abusers
summary:
“It was a place of whites and blacks and greys. White 
towers and white snow and white statues, black shadows and black trees,...
body:
“It was a place of whites and blacks and greys. White towers and white snow and white statues, black shadows and black trees, the dark grey sky above. A pure world, Sansa thought. I do not belong here.                      

Yet she stepped out all the same.”

- ASOS, Sansa VII

YET SHE STEPPED OUT ALL THE SAME.

I love this passage, because Sansa is CHOOSING to continue to pursue goodness and purity even after she believes herself to be sullied by the cruelties she’s endured. No matter how many people try to violently wrench her away from her idealism, she is still drawn in that direction purely by instinct, and it will be her salvation.

So I vehemently reject D&D’s narrative that Sansa will become some cold-hearted, bitter ice queen who rejects love and compassion and adopts her abusers’ values and passing it off as “strength”. No ma’am. It takes MORE strength to rise above the toxicity and remain good and hopeful than it does to just give in to your demons and to the people who tried to break you. Sansa Stark WILL NOT BE BROKEN.

Sansa Stark WILL NOT BE BROKEN.

summary: Lysa threw herself into Littlefinger's arms, sobbing. As they hugged, Sansa crawled from the Moon Door on hands and knees and...
caption: Lysa threw herself into Littlefinger’s arms, sobbing. As they hugged, Sansa crawled from the Moon Door on hands and knees and wrapped her arms around the nearest pillar. She could feel her heart pounding. There was snow in her hair and her right shoe was missing. It must have fallen. She shuddered, and hugged the pillar tighter.

trail.content_raw: Lysa threw herself into Littlefinger’s arms, sobbing. As they hugged, Sansa crawled from the Moon Door on hands and knees and wrapped her arms around the nearest pillar. She could feel her heart pounding. There was snow in her hair and her right shoe was missing. It must have fallen. She shuddered, and hugged the pillar tighter.
trail.content: Lysa threw herself into Littlefinger’s arms, sobbing. As they hugged, Sansa crawled from the Moon Door on hands and knees and wrapped her arms around the nearest pillar. She could feel her heart pounding. There was snow in her hair and her right shoe was missing. It must have fallen. She shuddered, and hugged the pillar tighter.

summary: ew comparing sansa smiling after killing ramsey to daenerys smiling after burning kings landing is disgusting. sansa smiled...
question: ew comparing sansa smiling after killing ramsey to daenerys smiling after burning kings landing is disgusting. sansa smiled after killing a man who raped her and physically and emotionally tortured her. daenerys smiled after burning innocent men, women, and children alive. (although just to clarify I have absolutely no issue with dany killing viserys because he was her abuser) i’ve also seen people try to compare sansa and arya killing littlefinger to daenerys burning kings landing. which wtf.
answer:
I agree with you! As I’ve said before, I have zero problem with Dany celebrating Viserys’ dying since he physically, emotionally, and sexually abused her. And even in the show, I interpreted her reaction as her compartmentalizing her feelings and trying to not show emotion rather than her reveling in his painful death. Plus, in the show, since she’s older, Dany (rightfully) states that she’s been sold and raped and abused but in the books, she’s so young that after their deaths, even though Viserys and Drogo treated her horrifically, she romanticizes them to the point she names her dragons after them as well as her (shitty) brother Rhaegar. 

But yeah, I saw the criticism about Sansa and Arya killing Littlefinger and I was like…. the dude was the reason their father was MURDERED, he killed their aunt, and started the War of the Five Kings, all because he was in love with their mother! In the show, he sold Sansa to Ramsay and although he sold Jeyne Poole to the Boltons in the books, book!Sansa will not be happy when she finds that out and I hope that she’s the reason book!Littlefinger dies as well. He deserved to die and the fact that Arya slit his throat was probably the most humane way to do it since he died quickly. Plus, another difference between them executing Littlefinger and Dany burning King’s Landing is that Littlefinger is one man who was the reason for so much suffering, not hundreds of thousands of civilians.
